review: Super cool device, love the size abd how quickly it boots up, But... It's got a few issues. First of all, the USB port is useless - they could easily make it play videos or show pictures from external devices but like apple they want their $$ so they try to force you buy everything at outrageous prices from the amazon store. Also, like all android devices, it often lags and jerks and chops when you're streaming video in netflix or hulu. It will slow down to slow motion, the audio will desynchronize from the video, then the video goes in hyperspeed until it catches up. It's very frustrating and happens about every 10 minutes. Lastly, the voice control ONLY works with the amazon prime content... Which means if you're looking for a movie, sure you can watch it, you'll just have to pay $7!!
